description:
Serious zinc-based protection without looking like you stepped out of a time machine from the ‘80s. KINeSYS Clear Zinc goes on white but rubs in clear, providing long-lasting, water resistant UV protection.

  • Broad spectrum UVA and UVB protection
  • Rated water resistant (80 minutes), the highest possible water resistance rating
  • Natural Peppermint and Rosemary scent
  • Thick cream goes a long way
  • 60g container is carry-on friendly and easy to toss in your bag
  • Zinc protects your skin while aloe, coconut oil and sunflower seed oil nourish your skin
  • Active ingredient: Zinc Oxide 25%
  • Inactive ingredients: aloe barbadensis leaf extract, bisabolol, beeswax (cruelty-free), capric / caprylic triglyceride, coconut oil, peppermint oil, polyhydroxystearic acid (and) isotearic acid, rosemary leaf oil, sunflower seed oil, tocopherols
name: KineSys SPF 30 Clear Zinc Sunscreen 60g
